data.title: Generated Kubernetes Manifest

content.code:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
  labels:
    app: nginx
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx:1.25.3
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi

insights: Deployment configured with 3 replicas for high availability
Resource limits set to prevent resource contention
Using nginx:1.25.3 which is the latest stable version
